name: I (don't) Know the Future
description:
The game takes place in New York City in 2035, in a universe in which the government uses people called Precogs, mutants who have the power to predict a week in the future, to arrest criminals before the crimes happen. The result of the Precogs reports are issued on only one card with the following information: the name of the offender, the victim's name, the location and details of what happened.

I (don't) Know the Future tells the story of a week of the Logan's life, a maintenance technician who works in the homicide department of PreCrime, the government's institution to solve crimes before the event. But this week something goes wrong and Logan finds only his name on a card. Since he doesn't get any other information and would be unable to kill someone he decides to investigate what will happen, that is, his possible death.

The game is just available in Portuguese (Brazil) - It may be translated to English soon...
